Receipts.title: sushi
Receipts.instructions: Place the seaweed on a bamboo mat, then cover the sheet of seaweed with an even layer of prepared sushi rice. Smooth gently with a rice paddle.Layer salmon, cream cheese, and avocado on the rice, and roll it up tightly. Slice with a sharp knife, and enjoy right away with soy sauce.
Receipts.ingredients: Fish, rice, vegetables, nori, rice vinegar, and soy sauce

Receipts.title: pancakes
Receipts.instructions: Heat a pan under low heat. Grease the pan with some oil or butter. Pour some pancake batter into the pan gently to form a circle. Cook the pancake until bubbles form on the top. Flip the pancake to cook the other side. Transfer the pancakes in a serving plate. Top with butter and enjoy with your favourite syrup.
Receipts.ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, eggs, and melted butter or oil

Receipts.title: mac and cheese
Receipts.instructions: Preheat the oven. Preheat to 325 degrees and lightly grease a square baking dish,cook the macaroni,slightly undercook your noodles,make the roux. Melt the butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat,add milk and cheese.
Receipts.ingredients: 8 ounces uncooked elbow macaroni,Â¼ cup salted butter,3 tablespoons all-purpose flour,2 cups shredded sharp Cheddar cheese,salt and ground black pepper to taste.

Receipts.title: mandazi
Receipts.instructions: add flour to a bowl,then add milk,sugar,baking powder,eggs and butter and mix all together.Pre heat the oil and cut the mixture to desired shaped and put them in the oil for 1 minute
Receipts.ingredients: all purpose flour,baking powder,vanilla essence,lemons,sugar,butter,milk,eggs, cooking oil.

Receipts.title: swahili-pilau
Receipts.instructions: Boil the meat till tender,Grind the garlic and the mixture of ingredients separately until fine in nature,Cut onion into a clean sufuria and add cooking oil to your desired amount,Cut onion into a clean sufuria and add cooking oil to your desired amount,Then add water to your desired amount
